pull.title: Explicitly pass CChainParams& to DisconnectTip()
pull.body:
Continue work on #7829 started by @jtimon 
Pass CChainParams& to UpdateTip(), DisconnectTip(), InvalidateBlock() and ConnectBlock(), and remove global Params()  call.

events.message: Globals: Explicitly pass const CChainParams& to UpdateTip()

events.body: I have a patch for ConnectBlock() which is also a few lines. Should I push it here as well?

Since ConnectBlock() is trivial enough and the PR is still recent, I would say we're still on time to slightly increase the scope of this PR with an additional commit.
@laanwj thoughts?
@jtimon fine with me. As I said in #7876, I prefer bundling changes that are easy to review like this one.
